content: meet tina a darling crochet turtle sure to steal your heart a fast and fun project this sweet turtle does double duty make her as a stuffed turtle amigurumi or make her into an adorable pincushion this crochet turtle will crawl into your life and snuggle into a little spot in your home or office it also makes a great gift note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own adorable turtle > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern materials needed * worsted weight cotton yarn * crochet hook size g * small buttons for eyes can embroider instead * stuffing * crushed walnut shells and pantyhose optional * tapestry needle * needle and thread to sew on buttons size turtle shown measures 2-1/4 tall to the top of the head by 4-1/4 long head to back of shell pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-turtle/
